job_description:
Recruitment Team (Intern, Recruiter & Recruiter Supervisor)

Join our team at Seven Retail! We’re looking for passionate and driven individuals who want to grow in recruitment, from learning the basics to leading strategic and mass hiring projects. In this role, you’ll also gain valuable experience handling various industries across our diverse business units.

What you’ll do:
Support and lead end-to-end recruitment activities
Partner with leaders on hiring needs and manpower planning
Build strong talent pipelines and ensure a great candidate experience
Stay updated with recruitment tools and best practices

What we’re looking for:
Proven in strategic role and mass hiring experience
Strong English communication (interviews & business discussions)
Skilled in sourcing, ATS, and recruitment best practices
Agile, collaborative, and able to thrive in a fast-paced environment
